data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Menegon, Michele, Davenport, Tim R. B., Howell, Kim M. (2011): Description of a new and critically endangered species of Atheris (Serpentes: Viperidae) from the Southern Highlands of Tanzania, with an overview of the country’s tree viper fauna. Zootaxa 3120: 43-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279365
